title: The Rudolf Steiner Fellowship Community - Foundation for Intentional Community
cleaned_text: Build your community knowledge by becoming an FIC member, and get access to hundreds of resources and training. From as little as $11 a month for a supporter or $22 for a learner. Our work is made possible thanks to community lovers like you. To support and promote the development of intentional communities as pathways towards a more sustainable and just world. Foundation for Intentional Community (FIC) is a registered 501(c)(3) non-profit organization. Our main office is located at Dancing Rabbit Ecovillage, MO, USA. Stewarding the communities movement
